svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - November 16 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
November 16, 2024" date: "2024-11-16"
Eth News and Links
Devconnect in 2025 & Devcon in 2026, Justin Drakeâ€™s beam chain proposal and Virgil Griffith coming
home in April
Layer 1
â€¢ FastEthereumCrawler : node discovery v5 (discv5) crawler based on Nim implementation
Research
â€¢ Justin Drake: beam chain proposal [video], upgrade consensus layer with a batch of features in ~2029
for faster slots, faster finality, SNARKs & quantum security
Justin Drake: beam chain proposal [video], upgrade consensus layer with a batch of features in ~2029
â€¢ Anders Elowsson: consolidation incentives in Orbit single slot finality
Anders Elowsson: consolidation incentives in Orbit single slot finality
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer:
Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Lodestar v1.23.0 : Mekong testnet support & fix for CPU illegal instruction
compatibility issue
â€¢ Lodestar v1.23.0 : Mekong testnet support & fix for CPU illegal instruction compatibility issue
Layer 2
â€¢ Lisk (former alt-L1) migrated to OP Stack
EIPs/Standards

â€¢ EIP7814 : Introspection precompiles

for EVM Applications ERC7817 : Dapp security policy ERC7818 : Expirable ERC20

ERC7815 : Swap order routing interface

Stuff for developers
â€¢ OpenZeppelin community contracts (Solidity): experimental contracts, co-developed libraries & newer
ERC implementations; unaudited
OpenZeppelin community contracts (Solidity): experimental contracts, co-developed libraries & newer

1-click/no-click user experience
Coinbase smart wallet spend permissions : request to spend native & ERC20 tokens for 1-click/no-click
user experience

DuneScan : block explorer in Dune

answers to 8 question Solidity quiz

Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance

gwei 0.3k ETH net burn this week
